name: Respectable Dr. Jekyll
description:
The respectable Dr. Jekyll is spending a delightful evening in the highest circles of society when when a sudden urge afflicts him. His sinful alter ego, Mr. Hyde, threatens to take over his body. Help him contain Mr. Hyde, or make sure no witness can report you to the police! 

This game contains a tutorial section to explain the controls.

*Upcoming fixes over the next days*
